job.title: Sr. Software Developer

learnsbrbrHave a passion for making a difference in the education careers and lives of hundreds of thousands of collegelevel students zyBooks a Wiley brand produces interactive online learning content for a full stack software developer with an emphasis on creating pleasant user experience for the web This person will be expected to work alongside a team of developers designer and product managers
